name: Coco and the dead universes
description:
PLEASE READ THE TEXT DOCUMENT AND THE DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS!

Think, you are in your room, and you start thinking "I want a new platformer, with a lot of content, with a great story and a lot of fun" You go to steam and...you pick hollow knigth and you start playing. 

Oh! My game...ok, features:

More than 30 collectibles only in the first world! They aren´t only of one type, there are the pink balls, the yellow ones, the mysterious blues and much more!

A lot of secrets. Maybe you can see some strange balls...or a mysterious machine...or something else. There is a lot to discover!

A big world to explore. With 2 unique zones, a abandoned factory and the sky-island. 

BUT! What is the game...i mean... What i must do? Well, anything you want! You can go to unlock the powers, or only go for some balls. But alwais having fun!.

And that´s all. Now download it, it´s free. Oh, btw music from patrickdearteaga.com    (I´m searching for a musician, if you are interested contact with us) The sprites are from a artist in itch.io. 0x72, this is the name of he/she. (thanks for the great assets!) and im interested if someone want to be the pixel artist of this game.

The game is in the 0.1 version, at this point it´s just a baby and i´m gonna suport it for a lot of years! You can support the game posting a coment below telling something of the game.

HAVE A GREAT TIME PLAYING!
